task.instruction: Your user id is noah_garcia_4365. You want to book a one-way flight from Charlotte to Houston. You are flexible with your travel dates and are willing to fly on any day between May 15 and May 20. You want to pick the date with the lowest total price. You want to fly in basic economy, with no baggage. You donâ€™t want to add travel insurance. You would like to use 50% of your gift card balance toward the payment. If the flight costs more than that, you will pay the rest using your card ending in 4667. Your birthday is already in your user profile, so you don't want to be asked for it again.
